error-codes.error-charge-max-amount: Maximum amount exceeded. Please adjust and try again.
error-codes.error-refund-max-amount: Maximum amount exceeded. Please adjust and try again.

errors.NEXI_NETS__CHARGE_FAILED: Please verify the details and try again. Alternatively, check the logs using this payment ID: {paymentId}.
errors.NEXI_NETS__REFUND_FAILED: Please verify the details and try again. Alternatively, check the logs using this charge ID: {paymentId}.
errors.NEXI_NETS__REFUND_AMOUNT_EXCEEDED: Please verify the amount and try again. Alternatively, check the logs using this charge ID: {paymentId}.
errors.NEXI_NETS__CANCEL_FAILED: Please verify the amount and try again. Alternatively, check the logs using this charge ID: {paymentId}.

payment-details.title: Payment
payment-details.charged-help-text: Charge amount is what you've already collected to your Nexi account.

charge.title: Charge (Nexi payment plugin)
charge.info: You're about to charge Order {orderNumber}. This means the payment will be collected and processed.

refund.title: Refund (Nexi payment plugin)
refund.info: You're about to initiate Refund for Order {orderNumber}.

cancel.confirmation: You're about to cancel payment with amount of {currency}{amount}.
cancel.title: Cancel (Nexi payment plugin)

notification.charge-message: You have successfully initiated a capture.
notification.refund-message: It may take 1-3 bank days to show in the recipientâ€™s account.
notification.action-error-message: Please try again, or check the logs for more details.
notification.fetch-error-message: Please try again, or check the logs for more details.
